title: Morning Joe 3/18/21
description: The man accused of killing eight people in three shootings at Atlanta-area spas was charged with eight counts of murder Wednesday. Also, Senate Democrats announced the introduction of a comprehensive voting reform bill, the For the People Act, on Wednesday. The Morning Joe panel discusses.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: The man accused of killing eight people in three shootings at Atlanta-area spas was charged with eight counts of murder Wednesday. Also, Senate Democrats announced the introduction of a comprehensive voting reform bill, the For the People Act, on Wednesday. The Morning Joe panel discusses.
